Description: Lip, neck and handle sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) pottery krater; orange clay with some silver mica; interior: top of neck streaky brown with band of white-red-white stripes just below lip; on top of broad lip maeander band, on edge blobs; exterior: cream slip; in panel to left of spool handle, pendent lotus flower and bud chain with red patches buds and heart of flowers.
Curator's comments: Very close to 1886,0401.1312, though the rim seems thinner, and the lotus flowers have a different style.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.510)
